SEARCH
Module imagingbook_plugins_demos
Package GenericFilterDemos

Class Custom_Generic_Filter_Vector

java.lang.Object
GenericFilterDemos.Custom_Generic_Filter_Vector
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp
public class Custom_Generic_Filter_Vector extends Object implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp
This ImageJ plugin shows how to construct a 3x3 custom generic vector filter based on class GenericFilterVector. This plugin works for all types of images.
Version:
2022/03/30
